questions.question: A flashlight app asks for Camera + Contacts. Should you grant this permission?
questions.explanation: A flashlight app should only need access to the camera/flashlight; requesting contacts is unnecessary.

questions.question: What should you do if an app requests permissions that seem excessive?
questions.explanation: Always verify the necessity of permissions by checking app reviews and developer details.

questions.question: If a game requests access to your SMS, what should you do?

options.answer: Allow it, it might be necessary.

questions.explanation: Games typically do not need access to your SMS; denying such requests is safer.
